item.title: Thoughts about the past/future and distance
item.description: I thought os a addition to this weblog awhile ago.. but it has left me. I am writing it anyway.. without a clue as to where it will lead me. I think it may be about my rockstar friend jamie - or maybe about existing in this weird world of fashion - without an idea of fashion.. I really don’t know. I have been reading a bunch of phillip k dick books.
